item.description:
COME IF YOU DARE!

Once upon a time, fifteen years or so ago, I bought a few Halloween decorations and held a small party for my two children in one room of my basement! Back then, seven children attended. Every year since, I would buy more decorations, and host another Halloween party.

The parties for the children grew and grew and grew wherefore I had to start having the parties in the main living areas of my house for I had up to 40+ children attend! My collection of Halloween decorations grew and grew and grew too! Thus I decorate my living room, kitchen, dining room and bathroom! Yes, bathroom! Did I mention my front yard?

Although my children are grown, I still continue to host an annual Halloween Party! So please come and enjoy yourself, mingle, and meet new friends! Children that do come will be given a goody bag full of treats! (so let me know if your bringing a child). They're may even be a treat for the adults unless it's a trick!

ALL ARE WELCOME!

Bring a friend!

Significant others are welcome!

Bring your Kids!

Or, if you prefer, come by yourself!

Please bring a dish to share!

BYOB for those that wish to indulge

Soft drinks & coffee/tea will be provided!

FOOD, DRINK, MUSIC, FUN & PRIZE FOR BEST COSTUME! Soooo Don't forget to wear your Halloween Costume!

This event is hosted in conjunction with Bob Kahn, founder and organizer of Cape Cod Friends! Check out his site at http://www.meetup.com...

NOTE: I do have a dog and cats so if your allergic, don't forget to take your allergy meds!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll open the door, or maybe........my alternate personality will depending on what I wear for a costume!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: "Howlin Halloween Costume Party" Significant Others, Friends, & Kids Welcome!
